input.sentences: the first step to making a gourmet meal is to chop the meat into little pieces .
next take the meat and put it in a pan to cook .
you must of course add onions for flavor . chop them up into small pieces .
next find your saute pan and cook the meat and vegetables together .
finally you have a finished dish that looks professional and delicious .
output.sentences: The pieces of meat were prepared step by step.
They meat was cooked in the pan.
The pieces of onion had flavor.
The vegetables were sauteed in the pan.
The professional dish was finally finished.
